artist: Designer: Henri Rapin; Decorator: Anne-Marie Fontaine; Manufacturer: Sèvres Porcelain Factory
creditline: The Modernism Collection, gift of Norwest Bank Minnesota
description: ovoid body decorated with continuous tropical landscape depicting distant mountains and sailboats, stylized palms, exotic birds and butterflies; capped with cover in matching blue glaze
markings: on vase: [AM Fontaine 90.37]; on underside: [S/Sevres Manufacture Nationale France L] and [16-12-37 PM]; [AMF] on cover
medium: Polychrome pastel impasto glazes on porcelain
title: "Tropiques" monumental jar and cover
